title: Would this constitute inting/trolling?
body:
https://youtu.be/whHDuQ3SZh8


If not, this player is obviously boosted and I'd like him to be looked into. No way this is a high gold/plat caliber player.

Throughout the first 10minutes of the game, he's used THREE abilities. And those consisted of only pressing w. After he dies and I question him then giving up the game due to blatant, or at least what seemed like, trolling he goes on to say, "Toxic Draven players. I've done nothing wrong". 

What say you community?

replies.body: Nah I see plat players do shit like this all the time

Nah. Doesnt look like trolling. Just bad decisionmaking. And no, it doesnt even REMOTELY look like he is "obviously boosted". You have to watch him in many games to determine that. Perhaps he was lagging. Or getting BJ under table. Or he had family pestering him so he couldnt play.  There are hundreds of factors. Also reason he didnt use abilities is cuz he knows Morgana will black shield it so its waste of mana.

It doesn't matter if she blackshields. I'm early game draven.... he let morg walk up to him a thousand times, poke him with w. She started W level 1 and this guy just walks around lane doing absolutely nothing. Black shield CD is almost 30 seconds rank 1. To top it off, he had attempted to turn that fight by hooking or fighting back we had a higher chance of actually winning that and turning that into a pretty decent trade. We even blew heal earlier into the game so we were up heal advantage.

So if he's a decent player, as you claim, then he's obviously trolling. There's 100 reasons to show that he's boosted in this one clip alone. One of those reasons include us WATCHING her walk into the bush in the first place. I could show the entire laning phase and show you what he did.

I mean I played against a katarina when I was in bronze still lol she raped us didn't type anything during or after match . Look at match history only 2 total games on Kat both of them in order . No kda before that even close to what that person had. So yah I fucking reported them and I posted on here . Boosting

> [{quoted}](name=TS Media,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BwyT7uBN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-22T23:46:41.649+0000)
>
> It doesn't matter if she blackshields. I'm early game draven.... he let morg walk up to him a thousand times, poke him with w. She started W level 1 and this guy just walks around lane doing absolutely nothing. Black shield CD is almost 30 seconds rank 1. To top it off, he had attempted to turn that fight by hooking or fighting back we had a higher chance of actually winning that and turning that into a pretty decent trade. We even blew heal earlier into the game so we were up heal advantage.
> 
> So if he's a decent player, as you claim, then he's obviously trolling. There's 100 reasons to show that he's boosted in this one clip alone. One of those reasons include us WATCHING her walk into the bush in the first place. I could show the entire laning phase and show you what he did.

As i said,there is no reason to believe someone is boosted based on only 1 game.
Just your classic case of boosted by duo.

I had a high platinum velkoz mid die trying to 1v1 dragon while we were (me as jg and our bot lane) racing to get the first tower bot after a succesfull gank by me on bot lane, and a succesfull gank by enemy mid on our top. The dude even blew his barrier trying to kill the dragon and he died, when any sane human being could have realized to just go bot and help us get tower before they could top, then we could ALL get dragon for free after. 

Expectations are MIA in league. Fairly certain 95% of playerbase is actually fish.
As I'm currently hardstuck in G3, tbh this looks tame to what I've seen in my games.
Boosted

That's definitely not trolling/inting, that's just playing bad. But I doubt that's enough to prove he's boosted, and even if he is, that's not a reason for calling him that and giving up on the game.

Also, everyone can have a terrible game and still be ranked super high. Rank isn't a measure of how well you can play any individual game, it's measure of how consistent you can be over the course of several dozens games.
good flash he didnt see morg go into the bush i also i didnt see any pings warning him your to blame as well
What? We did see Morg go into the bush. She was highlighted as she walked in. Our ward expired just a little after she went in.

> [{quoted}](name=TS Media,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BwyT7uBN,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-04-23T16:55:11.608+0000)
>
> What? We did see Morg go into the bush. She was highlighted as she walked in. Our ward expired just a little after she went in.

the more i see the video the more i see that you didnt do anything when morgs snare was down

Yeah, when your support doesn't throw out any skills you can go ahead and attempt to save him. If you check the video properly, the second he got snared I moved up into an aggressive stance. Dude didn't attempt to do anything, so I backed off. It would've been a waste of time.

> [{quoted}](name=TS Media,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BwyT7uBN,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-23T21:21:37.202+0000)
>
> Yeah, when your support doesn't throw out any skills you can go ahead and attempt to save him. If you check the video properly, the second he got snared I moved up into an aggressive stance. Dude didn't attempt to do anything, so I backed off. It would've been a waste of time.

you were hit by a magical 4 sec fear come on guy he was being focused you were full hp with flash and heal up
Honestly the only thing I saw was the draven missed 3-5 autos by sitting there doing nothing. Biggest troll of all.
Thresh didnt use skills all lane phase. Based on how he played lvls 1-5 I didnt step up because he wasnt playing the game.

Hes not trolling or inting, he propably wanted to check that bush or ward it....why would he do it this way? Who knows. Maybe hes just stupid.
But its not even close to trolling nor inting.

Legit, we had vision of morg... minions attacked her like twice before he ended up getting binded. We knew exactly where she was. She was highlighted in the bush.

My point being he didn't react at all to it if you look at the video. No hook, no flay, no exhaust. Nothing. He had 0 reactions and he played that way the entire game.

> [{quoted}](name=TS Media,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BwyT7uBN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-23T01:02:38.948+0000)
>
> Legit, we had vision of morg... minions attacked her like twice before he ended up getting binded. We knew exactly where she was. She was highlighted in the bush.
> 
> My point being he didn't react at all to it if you look at the video. No hook, no flay, no exhaust. Nothing. He had 0 reactions and he played that way the entire game.

You have no vision in that bush, mean, no wards.
As i said earlier, maybe hes a bit stupid and he wanted to ward it. No reason to call it troll anyway.
